reuters.title: CHEMLAWN CORP, ECHOLAB INC SIGN DEFINITIVE MERGER AGREEMENT
reuters.body: Shr 43 cts vs 37 cts Net 2,276,000 vs 1,674,000 Revs 32.6 mln vs 24.4 mln Year Shr 90 cts vs 69 cts Net 4,508,000 vs 3,096,000 Revs 101.0 mln vs 76.9 mln Avg shrs 5,029,000 vs 4,464,000 NOTE: 1986 fiscal year ended Feb 1, 1986 Reuter 
